personalInformation.name: Deepu Roy
personalInformation.title: Principal Consultant - Quality Engineering & AI/ML Enablement
personalInformation.summary: Strategic technical leader transforming enterprise QA and automation delivery with 20 years of experience. Expert in test automation platforms, AI/ML workflows, and global team mentorship.

projectHighlights.projectDescription: Monthly releases delivered with speed and quality. The BDD Selenium-based framework is instrumental in uncovering issues and enabling complete system testing faster. Verifies working of backend process and generated files including pdf, eliminating complex manual verifications. Its specialty: targeting multiple customer environments and providing actionable results.
Selenium BDD framework runs daily, providing rapid feedback as the team migrates from legacy systems. This automation is instrumental in identifying issues early and supporting a smooth transition.

Implementing a highly abstract Playwright framework for comprehensive end-to-end UI testing, including accessibility tree checks and console error verification. Separate framework for API schema regression using OpenAPI. API tests leverage API spec-generated clients and RestSharp. Team delivers on a two-week release cycle.
